title: Calories in 1 Cup 2% Milk
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 cup 2 percent milk, including full nutrition breakdown with protein, carbs, fat, and quick variations for your diet.
assumptions: Reduced-fat (2%) cow's milk, pasteurized, no additives; 1 cup â‰ˆ 244 g or 240 ml.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, fortification, and processing; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of 2% milk provides ~122 kcal and ~8 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup 2 percent milk?
What's the protein in 1 cup of 2% milk?
Does 2% milk have a lot of sugar?
faqs.a: It contains ~12.3 g of natural lactose sugars per cup.

faqs.q: How does 2% milk compare to whole milk calories?
faqs.a: 2% has ~122 kcal per cup; whole milk has ~150 kcal.

faqs.q: Is the fat in 2% milk mostly saturated?
faqs.a: Yes, ~3.1 g saturated fat out of 4.8 g total fat per cup.
